companyName: ETRACS Monthly Pay 2XLeveraged Mortgage REIT ETN
description:
The investment seeks to link to the Market Vectors® Global Mortgage REITs Index.
 The index tracks the overall performance of publicly-traded mortgage REITs that derive at least 50% of their revenues from mortgage-related activities. The Securities are senior unsecured debt securities issued by UBS AG (UBS). The Securities provide a monthly compounded two times leveraged long exposure to the performance of the Index, reduced by the Accrued Fees.
